185958002.review:
Recensione di Assetto Corsa

Assetto Corsa, sviluppato dal team italiano Kunos Simulazioni, è uno dei simulatori di guida più acclamati nel panorama videoludico. Rilasciato inizialmente per PC nel 2014 e successivamente adattato per console, il titolo si distingue per il suo realismo senza compromessi, la vasta selezione di veicoli e circuiti, e una comunità appassionata che ha contribuito a renderlo un punto di riferimento nel genere.

Fisica e Realismo di Guida

Uno degli aspetti più elogiati di Assetto Corsa è la sua fisica di guida. Il motore fisico è stato sviluppato con un'attenzione maniacale ai dettagli, rendendo ogni vettura unica nel comportamento su strada. La sensazione al volante è straordinariamente realistica, grazie a un sistema di force feedback che trasmette fedelmente le irregolarità della pista, le variazioni di aderenza e le forze generate dalla velocità e dalla frenata.

Ogni parametro è stato curato per riflettere le dinamiche reali: il trasferimento di peso, l'usura degli pneumatici, la temperatura del motore e persino i livelli di carburante influenzano le prestazioni del veicolo. Questi elementi non solo rendono il gioco incredibilmente immersivo, ma richiedono anche una buona dose di abilità e strategia per avere successo.

Parco Auto e Licenze Ufficiali

Assetto Corsa offre una collezione impressionante di veicoli, che spaziano dalle utilitarie ai prototipi da competizione. Il gioco vanta licenze ufficiali di marchi prestigiosi come Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, BMW, e molti altri. Ogni vettura è stata riprodotta con una fedeltà maniacale, sia dal punto di vista estetico che meccanico. Il sound design delle auto è altrettanto impressionante, catturando ogni dettaglio acustico, dai rombi dei motori agli stridii degli pneumatici.

Circuiti e Ambientazioni

I circuiti di Assetto Corsa sono una celebrazione delle piste più iconiche del motorsport mondiale. Dalle curve tecniche di Monza e Spa-Francorchamps alle sfide ad alta velocità di Silverstone e Nürburgring, ogni tracciato è stato ricreato utilizzando la tecnologia Laser Scan. Questo assicura che ogni curva, ondulazione e cordolo siano identici alle loro controparti reali. L'attenzione ai dettagli si estende anche agli elementi ambientali, come le condizioni meteorologiche e l'illuminazione, che contribuiscono a un'esperienza di guida autentica.

Modalità di Gioco

Assetto Corsa include diverse modalità di gioco, adatte sia ai neofiti che ai piloti esperti. La Modalità Carriera offre una progressione graduale, mentre le Gare Veloci e le Modalità Online permettono di affrontare sfide immediate o competere con altri giocatori in tempo reale. Il multiplayer è uno degli aspetti più apprezzati, grazie alla possibilità di partecipare a campionati e gare organizzate dalla comunità.

Un altro elemento distintivo è la possibilità di personalizzare le sessioni di gioco. I giocatori possono scegliere le condizioni meteorologiche, il numero di avversari e persino regolare i parametri di difficoltà per adattare l'esperienza alle proprie preferenze.

Grafica e Prestazioni

Graficamente, Assetto Corsa offre un'esperienza visiva di alto livello, soprattutto su PC. I modelli delle auto sono dettagliati in modo impeccabile, con texture realistiche e riflessi accurati. Anche i circuiti sono resi con grande cura, offrendo una rappresentazione visiva fedele delle piste reali. Tuttavia, sulle console di vecchia generazione, il gioco soffre di alcune limitazioni tecniche, come texture meno dettagliate e frame rate meno stabile.

Supporto Modding

Uno degli aspetti più rivoluzionari di Assetto Corsa è il supporto alle mod. La comunità ha creato un numero incredibile di contenuti aggiuntivi, tra cui nuove auto, piste e persino modalità di gioco. Questo non solo ha esteso la longevità del titolo, ma ha anche permesso ai giocatori di sperimentare contenuti che altrimenti non sarebbero stati disponibili.

Espansioni e DLC

Oltre al gioco base, Assetto Corsa ha ricevuto numerosi DLC che hanno ampliato ulteriormente l'offerta. Pacchetti come il "Dream Pack" e il "Porsche Pack" hanno introdotto veicoli e circuiti aggiuntivi, arricchendo l'esperienza complessiva. Sebbene alcuni contenuti siano a pagamento, la qualità e la varietà offerte giustificano ampiamente l'investimento.

Punti di Forza

Fisica di guida eccezionale e realistica.

Ampia varietà di auto e circuiti con licenze ufficiali.

Supporto modding che prolunga la vita del gioco.

Multiplayer competitivo e ben strutturato.

Grafica e sound design di alto livello.

Criticità

Nonostante i numerosi pregi, Assetto Corsa non è esente da difetti. L'intelligenza artificiale degli avversari è talvolta imprevedibile e può risultare frustrante, soprattutto nelle gare più competitive. Inoltre, l'assenza di condizioni meteorologiche dinamiche limita leggermente la varietà delle esperienze di guida. Infine, l'interfaccia utente potrebbe risultare poco intuitiva per i nuovi giocatori.

Conclusione

Assetto Corsa è un capolavoro del genere simulativo, che combina un realismo straordinario con un'ampia gamma di contenuti. Nonostante alcune imperfezioni, il gioco si distingue come una delle esperienze più autentiche e coinvolgenti per gli appassionati di motorsport. Sia che siate neofiti alla ricerca di un titolo accessibile, sia che siate piloti esperti alla ricerca di una sfida, Assetto Corsa ha qualcosa da offrire a tutti.

Se amate la guida e desiderate immergervi in un mondo di velocità e precisione, Assetto Corsa è senza dubbio un acquisto obbligato.

185736385.review:
Assetto Corsa is, without a doubt, one of the best racing simulators ever created. Even years after its release, it continues to shine thanks to its incredible physics, thriving modding community, and active multiplayer scene.

The game’s physics are nothing short of outstanding. Every car feels unique and true to life, offering an immersive driving experience that few games can match. Whether you're taking on a challenging corner or pushing a car to its limits on the straights, Assetto Corsa delivers an unparalleled sense of realism.

What truly sets this game apart is its amazing modding community. From custom cars and tracks to enhanced graphics and gameplay tweaks, the sheer amount of content created by fans is mind-blowing. This community-driven support has kept the game feeling fresh and exciting, allowing players to enjoy endless variety and personalization.

And let’s not forget the active multiplayer scene! Despite its age, Assetto Corsa still boasts a dedicated player base, with servers hosting everything from casual track days to intense competitive racing. The multiplayer experience is seamless, making it easy to find races that suit your skill level and style.

Assetto Corsa is more than just a game—it's a platform for car enthusiasts, sim racers, and modders alike. If you’re a fan of racing games, this is a must-have in your collection. It’s a true masterpiece that continues to set the standard for simulation racing.

185703007.review: Although AC is by now seen as an outdated racing sim it still manages to convey a puristic but highly realistic simulation of race driving. The selection of cars has some hotspots around the bigger racing brands like Ferrari and Porsche but there are also a few other brands that are all depicted meticulously and in great detail. Given the right controllers (wheel and pedals) this racing sim will quickly suck you into cornering faster, braking later and trying to find that tight spot where your tires are about to lose their grip. Not and arcade racer in any sense, very down to earth and without fancy soundtrack or eye candy. Just barebones racing.

185655078.review:
Assetto Corsa é simplesmente incrível! Se você ama carros, velocidade e a sensação de estar no controle de uma máquina poderosa, esse jogo é tudo o que você precisa. Desde o momento em que você pisa fundo no acelerador, é impossível não ficar impressionado com o realismo absurdo que ele oferece.

A física do jogo é de outro mundo! Cada curva, cada frenagem, cada ajuste no carro... tudo parece tão real que você sente como se estivesse em uma pista de verdade. É como se o volante estivesse na sua mão (especialmente se você tiver um simulador, mas mesmo no controle, a imersão é absurda!). O cuidado com os detalhes nos carros e nas pistas é insano — dá pra ver o amor que colocaram no desenvolvimento.

O que torna Assetto Corsa ainda mais especial é a liberdade que ele dá para personalização. Você pode ajustar cada detalhe do seu carro e configurar a experiência do seu jeito, seja como um piloto profissional ou apenas para curtir uma corrida casual. E as mods? Meu Deus, as mods! Com a comunidade ativa e criativa, o jogo nunca fica velho. Sempre tem algo novo pra experimentar, seja uma pista famosa ou um carro lendário.

E a sensação de progresso? A cada volta, você sente que está melhorando, dominando o traçado e conquistando segundos preciosos. É viciante! Fora que dá pra jogar sozinho, competir online ou apenas testar carros icônicos como se estivesse realizando um sonho.

Se você quer um simulador de corrida que entrega paixão, desafio e uma experiência imersiva de verdade, Assetto Corsa é o jogo certo. Ele não é só um jogo, é uma paixão para quem ama automobilismo. Prepare-se para passar horas na pista e se apaixonar mais a cada corrida!

185547534.review:
ASSETO CORSA has always been in my wishlist for couple of years, i bought it after i got myself the LOGITECH G29. As this is a pretty old game there is some noticeable pros and cons which i would like to mention.

Pros : the driving mechanics are just perfect and almost feels real for most of the times. The game is highly moddable and the modding scene in this game is huge making most of the mods very reliable and trustworthy to use. After you are done modding the game, the gameplay, the ambience and the feel of the game itself will surely make u addicted and keep u hooked with this game for a very long time

Cons : As the game is relatively old, the base game does't really come with much, the graphics aren't that good and also the game feels really dead and dry without mods. Installing mods aren't easy either and for beginners it's a huge hassle. Paid mods are also available for purchase which are made by the players themselves. The biggest con about this game is that if you don't own a wheel consider not buying this game as it's unplayable without a wheel

Overall I highly recommend ASSETTO CORSA if you own a wheel, as this game will truly give you the feeling of driving at home.

RATING'S ONCE THE GAME IS MODDED :

Graphics : 9/10
Gameplay : 10/10
Replayability : 10/10
Sound : 10/10
Content : 10/10
Maps : 8.5/10

Overall rating : 9/10

185382392.review:
I’ve had an absolute blast playing Assetto Corsa, especially on the No Hesi server. The level of realism and immersion this game offers, particularly in VR, is nothing short of spectacular. The detailed car physics, stunning graphics, and vast modding possibilities make it a standout title in the racing sim genre.

The No Hesi server adds an entirely new layer of excitement. The fast-paced traffic simulations and intense highway battles feel incredibly authentic and keep me coming back for more. It's the perfect setting to test your driving skills and enjoy heart-pounding moments that few other games can replicate.

One of the game’s biggest strengths is its modding community, which keeps the experience fresh with endless custom cars, tracks, and configurations. The VR integration is smooth, and the sensation of being inside the car is incredibly immersive.

The only downside is the somewhat steep learning curve for beginners and the occasional setup hiccups with mods or servers. However, once you get past that, it’s pure racing bliss.

I highly recommend Assetto Corsa to anyone who loves racing games or wants a deeply immersive VR experience. The No Hesi server is the icing on the cake for thrill-seekers who crave high-speed action.

185300427.review:
Un simulateur qui déçois aux premiers abord, dû certainement au launcher peu agréable à l'utilisation et sa diversité de véhicule et de circuit assez limité (néanmoins correct pour un jeu de 2014). 
CEPENDANT, ce simulateur est un immense terrier de lapin. Quelques recherches et la version ultime se transforme en plusieurs simulateurs/jeux en un. Content Manager (une sorte de launcher alternatif), quelques mods et vous êtes prêts à passez des centaines d'heures sur ce simulateur. L'une des choses que je préfère le plus est le fait qu'il y'en ait pour tout les goûts: Vous souhaitez faire du drift, une voiture, un circuit et c'est parti. Vous êtes plutôt arcade alors SRP (Shutoko Revival Project) et un serveur NoHesi vour iront comme un gant. 
Bref ce jeu a déjà fait ses preuves et ne cesse de prouver qu'il est un des meilleurs dans sa catégorie au fil des ans. Quoi qu'il arrive si vous aimez le monde auto et le simracing vous n'aurez aucun mal à trouver votre bonheur en faisant quelques recherches et quelques téléchargements sur Assetto Corsa.
Bon jeu et bonne route

185264376.review:
Assetto Corsa to gra, która mimo upływu lat wciąż wyróżnia się świetnym odwzorowaniem fizyki i dokładnym modelem jazdy. Force feedback na kierownicy robi bardzo dobre wrażenie, przekazując wiele szczegółów dotyczących zachowania samochodu na drodze – od drobnych nierówności po utratę przyczepności.

Podstawowa zawartość gry jest raczej skromna, ale siła Assetto Corsa tkwi w jej elastyczności. Z pomocą modyfikacji i narzędzi takich jak Content Manager gra staje się czymś zupełnie nowym. Możliwość dodawania tras, samochodów i dodatkowych funkcji sprawia, że łatwo dostosować ją do swoich preferencji, niezależnie od tego, czy interesuje Cię luźna jazda po malowniczych drogach czy poważniejsze wyścigi na torze.

W porównaniu do Assetto Corsa Competizione, która skupia się na bardziej zorganizowanych wyścigach endurance, tutaj znajdziesz większą swobodę i różnorodność. Jest to bardziej otwarta platforma niż sztywno zaprojektowany symulator.

Polecam grę zarówno osobom, które chcą po prostu pograć dla przyjemności, jak i tym, którzy szukają symulatora, który można rozwijać i personalizować.

185227006.review:
键盘表示完全能玩！
生涯模式的AI难度调到最低，起码一半都能跑到第一（因为后面一半还没玩到那233）
我是NFS17入坑的，所以键位也用了类似的
A加速 Z刹车 空格手刹 左Shift和Ctrl升降档 方向键左右转弯（游戏设置里找不到离合器选项，即便难度那里把离合器开了也没有）难度设置除了把ABS打开以外其他都可以往硬核方向调。
键盘确实没有线性操控，不过可以通过连续快速不同节奏的点按来控制油门刹车（有点难）在设置那里把转弯速度调到合适自己的感觉，左右弯也可以点按找节奏不让轮胎打滑。
缺点的话肯定也有，加速刹车的时候不是线性而是一段一段的，画面就有一种一突一突的感觉（加速时镜头远离，刹车镜头贴近的原因）
还有个问题是按键冲突，游戏默认Ctrl+A是开关ABS，还找不到哪里可以更改这个快捷键，我这个键位习惯了太难改了，有时候跑着跑着ABS关了把我整个节奏都打断了qaq（前面几十个小时都不知道这个，以为ABS是自动因为什么开关的233）
也许算不上特别专业，跟有一套设备的那种肯定不能比，不过个人认为“娱乐硬核”的感觉还是不错的（难度对我来说刚刚好，既可以感受到赛车的速度感也可以感受到微操的爽感，又不至于太过硬核而玩不了）
至于手柄的话，我是真的不习惯233，也许手柄可以做到更好，不过对于我来说还是键盘已经这么熟练了不需要再去从头开始一个新操作了

185197097.review:
Title: An Impressive Racing Simulator with Some Shortcomings
★★★★☆

Assetto Corsa stands out as a remarkable racing simulator that excels in many areas, though it does have its shortcomings. As a fan of both casual racing games and more serious simulations, I found this title to be an excellent compromise. The physics engine truly shines—it’s highly detailed and gives each car a distinct feel, making them challenging to master. Successfully navigating a corner feels incredibly rewarding, often leading to hours spent perfecting laps.

The selection of cars and tracks is impressive, but the modding community is what really elevates the experience. There’s an abundance of content available through mods, including rare car models and additional tracks not included in the base game. This significantly enhances the game’s value, as sticking solely to the default options can feel somewhat limiting. Nevertheless, the base game offers a solid lineup of fantastic cars and iconic tracks, ensuring there’s plenty to enjoy even without mods.

However, the game does have its flaws. The AI can be hit or miss—sometimes it provides a fair challenge, while other times it can be either too easy or frustratingly difficult. Multiplayer can also be a mixed bag. Public lobbies can often be chaotic, and the matchmaking system feels a bit outdated compared to newer racing sims. Joining a community or participating in private events can greatly improve the experience, but newcomers might find it lacking.

In spite of these drawbacks, Assetto Corsa remains an outstanding choice for racing enthusiasts. It strikes a wonderful balance between realism and accessibility, especially if you adjust the settings to match your skill level. If you’re ready to invest time in mastering the cars and tracks—and perhaps explore the mods—it’s one of the most fulfilling racing simulators available. Just be ready for a few challenges along the way.

184984760.review:
Great sim racing game at base level. Good car options and track options.

But Jesus Christ, once you download Content Manager and start downloading mods, the sky is the fucking limit. Absolutely amazing 11/10 experience that I can't put down for more than a couple days because I just get that itch to try something new regarding mods.

Want to drive GT3 and Hypercars around Le Mans experience night and day? Go for it.
Want to drive 60s F1 cars around historic Spa to recreate the greatness that is Jim Clark? Go for it.
Want to drive 60s/70s sportscars around historic Le Mans or Longford for high speed thrill? Go for it.
Want to drive modern supercars around Japan's or German's highway system with traffic? Go for it.
Want to carve through canyons or coastal areas like in California in your Rx7? Go for it.
Want to have a track day of random cars speeding around the Nordschleife? Go for it.

Assetto Corsa has one of the richest modding communities out there. If you can think of it, there's like a 95% chance you can do it. And, modding is extremely easy with Content Manager, just download the track or car you want, make your way into Content Manager, click in the upper righhand corner, and have it automatically install it for you. Super simple.

184968417.review:
Among all other driving games, this one seems the least fleshed out on the surface. This game is like a stew. A cold stew, with several unpeeled potato chunks, uncooked beef, and some noodles. Despite it looking unappetizing at first, if you let it ferment just a little bit longer with the help of mods, you will find the game is incredibly diverse. Drifting? Done. Driving down a Japanese road? Done. Competent racing along the Nürburgring? Sure, but I'd wait for Assetto Corsa Evo.

It should also be well versed that the game is quite hard to get into. The game is quite selective over which people will enjoy it. The game, for all that it's worth, can only really be enjoyed by a select group of individuals. There isn't a story. There's barely any customization. The base game itself is so limited, that some might even consider it a demo for a much larger game. However, it does do one thing right: racing. If you have come for the thrill, that adrenaline. That feeling of the perfect downshift. That's what the game is about.

As a final mention, it should be well known that this game requires knowledge over your respective system. To get the game to a manageable level of coolness, you will need to learn about 'root folders' and things like 'unzipping files.' If this is your cup of tea, go ahead. Or.. Your cup of soup. If any of this sounds interesting to you, I recommend getting it. I mean, what's the worst that could happen? The game goes on sale fairly regularly for sub-five dollars. Either way, happy driving!

184862668.review:
Assetto Corsa — это настоящее сокровище для любителей автоспорта! 🚗💨 Этот симулятор по праву заслужил свою популярность благодаря реалистичной физике, потрясающей графике и невероятной внимательности к деталям.

Плюсы, которые впечатляют с первых минут:
Реализм на высоте:
Управление автомобилями настолько точное, что буквально чувствуешь каждый поворот руля и взаимодействие шин с дорогой. Разные поверхности трасс требуют уникального подхода, и это добавляет невероятного удовольствия от вождения.

Огромное количество контента:
В игре доступны десятки лицензированных автомобилей и трасс, воссозданных до мельчайших деталей. Хочешь прокатиться на культовом Ferrari или исследовать легендарный Нюрбургринг? Пожалуйста!

Моды — это отдельная магия:
Благодаря активному сообществу, игра практически не имеет границ. Установив моды, можно добавить новые автомобили, трассы и даже полностью изменить визуальный стиль игры с помощью улучшенных графических пакетов и шейдеров.

Подходит для всех:
Новички могут начать с аркадного стиля, а опытные водители оценят профессиональный уровень сложности, который заставит серьезно попотеть.

Идеально для гонок с друзьями:
Сетевая игра дарит незабываемый опыт, особенно если участвовать в организованных чемпионатах или устраивать дружеские заезды.

Графика и звук:
Assetto Corsa радует потрясающими визуальными эффектами. Солнечный свет, отражения, текстуры автомобилей и трасс — все выполнено с любовью. А звук? Реалистичное рычание двигателя, визг тормозов и даже звуки шин на поворотах создают полное погружение.

Мой личный опыт:
Первые заезды на трассах буквально приковали меня к экрану. Каждый поворот, каждое ускорение вызывали восторг. В какой-то момент я поймал себя на мысли, что уже несколько часов подряд тестирую разные авто, и это доставляет невероятное удовольствие.

Если вы ищете игру, которая подарит вам незабываемые ощущения скорости и адреналина, Assetto Corsa — это ваш выбор. Она не просто игра, это симулятор мечты, который заставляет вас возвращаться снова и снова. 🚀

Моя оценка: 10/10. 👏

ПРО ИГРУ РАССКАЗАТЬ НЕЧЕГО ПОЭТОМУ РЕЦЕПТ БЛИНОВ НА МОЛОКЕ
 
В глубокую миску разбить яйца.

  - шаг №3
Добавить сахар и соль.

 шаг №4
Тщательно взбить яйца с сахаром при помощи венчика или миксера. Затем добавить молоко. Хорошо взбить смесь.
  шаг №5
Просеять муку.

 шаг №6
Небольшими порциями добавлять муку, хорошо взбивая блинное тесто венчиком, чтобы не было комков.

Фото приготовления рецепта: Блины молочные тонкие - шаг №7
Затем добавить растительное масло. Перемешать.

Фото приготовления рецепта: Блины молочные тонкие - шаг №8
Тесто для блинов готово к выпечке.

 шаг №9
Хорошо разогреть сковороду, первый раз налить 1 ч. ложку растительного масла и распределить его по сковороде (удобно силиконовой кисточкой).
Налить тесто на сковороду (половину или 2/3 половника, зависит от размера сковороды). Быстро вращая сковороду, распределить тесто тонким слоем по дну сковородки.
Печь тонкий блин на среднем огне с одной стороны 1-2 минуты, до румяности.

Фото приготовления рецепта: Блины молочные тонкие - шаг №10
Затем перевернуть и печь блин с другой стороны еще примерно 0,5 минуты.

шаг №11
Подавать тонкие блины с любой начинкой - медом, джемом, сметаной, красной икрой и т.п.

 Блины молочные тонкие - шаг №12
Приятного чаепития!

Assetto Corsa is the gold standard for racing simulations. Its unmatched attention to detail, realistic physics, and deep customization options make it a dream for enthusiasts and sim racers alike. Whether you're dialing in car setups or tackling the perfect racing line, the level of immersion is second to none.

The modding community is a standout feature, offering endless tracks, cars, and enhancements that keep the game fresh years after release. From legendary circuits to niche vehicles, there's something for every racing fan.

The force feedback and handling feel incredibly natural, providing a true sense of connection to the car and track. Combined with the stunning visuals and authentic sound design, Assetto Corsa delivers an unparalleled driving experience.

For anyone serious about racing sims, this is a must-have. Whether you’re chasing lap times or cruising through iconic circuits, Assetto Corsa offers a racing experience that’s hard to beat.

184756860.review:
I purchased AC almost a year ago but found it very hard to play without a proper wheel setup so it sat unused until I finally purchased a setup with wheel, three pedals and shifter.  Now I highly recommend the game after I got it working properly.  This is what you need to do:

1) Disable steam input- yes, that's right.  You want the wheel assigned in the game
2) Now assign all of the rig inside the program

VR tips:
When you run VR, the steering wheel and rest of the rig will not work until you press the start button!  Took me a while to dig on line to figure this out.

Also, I am pretty resistant to motion sickness but got it right away in VR.  My rig runs 45 fpm in VR.

The good:  has a good mix of vehicles.  I am particularly fond of the air-cooled 911s and was able to get two, including the famous RUF yellowbird.  The game is a lot of fun once set up.

The bad:  In VR you have to start to run but it only happens through mouse input.  You end a session by keyboard input (ESC) and there is no in-program way to set your wheel buttons to perform these duties (people recommend something called JoyToKey).  If they fix this, it would be great.  Also, you will need to watch a few YT videos to learn how to get things started.

In summary, once you know the software and have it properly set up, it is a very good game.  Looking forward to seeing how to add other tracks.

184661880.review:
Assetto Corsa — это эталон среди гоночных симуляторов, созданный для настоящих энтузиастов автоспорта. Игра от студии Kunos Simulazioni предлагает невероятный уровень реализма, глубокую физику и огромное внимание к деталям, что делает её идеальным выбором для тех, кто хочет почувствовать себя за рулём настоящего гоночного автомобиля.

Основные достоинства:

1. Реалистичная физика
Assetto Corsa известна своей точной физической моделью. Каждая машина ощущается уникально, а управление передаёт нюансы работы подвески, сцепления с дорогой и аэродинамики. Это идеальный инструмент для тех, кто хочет понять поведение автомобилей на гоночной трассе.


2. Широкий выбор автомобилей
В игре представлены автомобили от ведущих мировых производителей: Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, BMW и многих других. Каждая модель тщательно воссоздана с использованием данных реальных машин, включая их технические характеристики и особенности.


3. Легендарные трассы
Assetto Corsa предлагает культовые гоночные трассы, такие как Нюрбургринг, Монца, Спа-Франкоршам и многие другие. Все трассы созданы с использованием лазерного сканирования, что обеспечивает максимальную точность рельефа и деталей.


4. Поддержка модов и сообщества
Одной из сильнейших сторон игры является активное сообщество моддеров. Игроки могут добавлять пользовательские автомобили, трассы и даже целые сценарии, что значительно расширяет возможности игры.


5. Гибкость настроек
Assetto Corsa подходит как для новичков, так и для профессионалов. Настройки сложности, физики и управления позволяют адаптировать игру под свои навыки и предпочтения.


6. Поддержка VR
Игра поддерживает виртуальную реальность, что позволяет полностью погрузиться в гоночный процесс. Это делает Assetto Corsa одним из лучших симуляторов для VR-устройств.


7. Мультиплеер
Сетевая игра позволяет соревноваться с другими гонщиками по всему миру. Вы можете участвовать в организованных чемпионатах или просто наслаждаться дружескими заездами.


8. Графика и звук
Несмотря на возраст, графика в Assetto Corsa остаётся впечатляющей. Детализация автомобилей и трасс дополняется качественными звуковыми эффектами, которые точно передают рев моторов и шум шин.



Итог

Assetto Corsa — это мечта любого фаната автоспорта. Она предлагает уникальное сочетание реализма, разнообразия контента и возможности для творчества. Это игра, которая учит уважать скорость, технику и искусство вождения, и она остаётся одной из лучших в жанре гоночных симуляторов.


Рекомендую.

184490531.review:
Como amante del automovilismo y poseedor de un cockpit en casa, Assetto Corsa es, sin duda, una de las mejores experiencias de simulación que puedes encontrar. La física del juego es simplemente espectacular; cada giro, aceleración y frenada se sienten reales, como si estuvieras en la pista.

La variedad de coches y circuitos es impresionante, y la atención al detalle en cada vehículo es un sueño hecho realidad para cualquier entusiasta. Con un buen set de pedales y un volante de calidad, la inmersión alcanza otro nivel. Además, su compatibilidad con mods amplía aún más las posibilidades, permitiendo añadir nuevos coches, pistas y configuraciones personalizadas.

Lo único que podría mejorarse es la inteligencia artificial, que en ocasiones no está a la altura de la experiencia general. Pero si disfrutas las carreras online o simplemente perfeccionar tu técnica, este título es imprescindible. Assetto Corsa no es solo un juego, es una herramienta de simulación que cualquier amante del automovilismo debe tener. ¡Totalmente recomendado!

[h1]“Sheer Driving Pleasure.纯粹驾驶乐趣”[/h1]
神力科莎新作Assetto Corsa EVO即将发布之际，无论是EVO的实机宣传图还是概览预告中出现的阿尔法罗密欧Giulia GTAm与法拉利Daytona SP3作为个人非常喜欢的车型相当令我着迷，以及新作宣称将在纽伯格林24th赛道基础上推出开放世界漫游驾驶玩法模式，迫不及待想驾驶爱车体验从赛道地图之外驶入纽北观光路线并尽情驰骋。在准备购入新作前特地回顾初代神力科莎及“竞速”Competizione，相比于Competizione专注LMGT组别车型及赛道日玩法，初代AC包含公路车的驾驶乐趣更令我所向往。
不过对于手柄玩家来说，最初其实是做好被游戏劝退的心态去游玩的，在没有外设方向盘游玩这类赛车模拟器有一定难度且缺少乐趣，而在实际游玩后意外的发现游戏对于Xbox手柄适配做的相当不错，至少短时间之内不用为高昂的外设做准备。AC对于车辆物理乃至声浪等车辆活动的还原设计做的相当到位，第一视角下每辆车的驾驶感受都各具特色并且张弛有力；游戏的第三人称锁定视角的车感虽不及ForzaMotorsport的动态追踪体验，但是作为极度拟真的第一视角驾驶体验，无论是换挡动作表现出的娴熟干练还是随车辆物理呈现的视角晃动都相当真实，单就第一人称可控座椅调节以及变更视距FOV这一设定就足以称道。

"Easy" steps on how to play with friends:
Step;
1. Search google.
2. Read reddit pages about how to play with friends.
3. Search youtube.

5. Download content manager.
6. Upgrade content manager.

19. Success. 

Have fun playing with your friend!

184200522.review:
ENGLISH

What to say about Assetto Corsa? Assetto Corsa is the classic example of a decent game that, thanks to the work of the community, is transformed into an indispensable masterpiece.
Why only decent? Because the game on its own doesn't offer much. True, it has a very advanced simulation system regarding the car and its behavior, but in terms of sound, car selection (many DLCs), and graphics, it doesn't hold up very well. Not to mention the variety, which is literally nonexistent.
The modders, on the other hand, have managed to transform the game into a winning project. Thanks to the content manager, we have a new UI (not beautiful, but okay), the ability to easily install new cars (making the car selection vast), and tracks. Additionally, there are various options such as real-time and dynamic weather, new lighting and atmospheric effects, and even the ability to use Spotify on the CarPlay of our virtual car! It goes without saying that this way, the game becomes a must-have. Personally, I haven't tried the feeling with the steering wheel yet (it will arrive soon), but thanks to a mod, it is really enjoyable and just the right amount of simulation even with the pad. Moreover, it is a project made by a team from my home country, Italy, so at the very least, I should give it an extra star.

ITALIANO
Cosa dire di assetto corsa? Assetto corsa è il classico esempio di gioco discreto che, per effetto del lavoro della comunità, viene trasformato in un capolavoro irrinunciabile.
Perchè solo discreto? Perchè il gioco preso a se non offre moltissimo. Vero, ha un sistema di simulazione molto avanzato riguardo all'auto e al suo comportamento ma a livello sonoro, di parco auto (molti dlc) e di grafica non si difende molto bene. Per non parlare della varietà che è letteralmente inesistente.
I modder invece hanno saputo trasformare il gioco in un progetto vincente. Grazie al content manager abbiamo una nuova UI (non bellissima, ma vabbe), la possibilità di installare facilmente nuove auto (rendendo il parco auto sterminato) e tracciati. Inoltre sono presenti svariate possibilità quali meteo in real time e dinamico, nuovi effetti di luce ed atmosferici e persino la possibilità di utilizzare spotify sul carplay della nostra auto virtuale! Inutile dire che in questo modo il gioco diventa un must have. Personalmente non ho ancora provato il feeling col volante (mi arrieverà a breve) ma grazie ad una mod è davvero piacevole e simulativo al punto giusto anche con il pad. Inoltre è un progetto fatto da un team mio connazionale, italiano, quindi come minimo dovrei dare una stella in più.

184098926.review:
this is a Assetto Corsa Review: Why You Should Play It below
Assetto Corsa is one of if not the best racing games in the market. Super fun and gives you so many cool options to try out. Whether you are learning how to race or just a die-hard car enthusiast, this game has something for every player.
Realistic Gameplay
What makes Assetto Corsa awesome, is that it's very real. Every car behaves in a different way, to be honest, which speaks volumes, considering real-life situations too. You almost feel the tyres grip road, the movement of a car while doing turns - it just feels super realistic. Of course, the manufacturers definitely tried very hard to inject realism into this game.

A Lot of Cars and a Good Amount of Tracks
With several cars and tracks in it, you can just simply have a classic car go into races, super-fast cars, and even Formula 1s on famous tracks such as the Monza or Spa. So much to play about right now, but stuff becomes really interesting with modifications.

Why Mods Are Great - Including No Hesi
Mods are just some extra stuff you can attach to your game, such as new cars, tracks, or even better graphics. The game turns out to be more interesting since you could try those things not existing in its regular version.

No Hesi is one cool mod that lets you drive super fast on highways full of traffic. It's a different kind of racing, where you have to dodge cars and make quick moves. It feels exciting and is a favorite in the Assetto Corsa community.

Why You Should Get It
Assetto Corsa is not a game but rather a creative place where you can have so much fun. The driving feels real, there's a ton of stuff to do, and mods like No Hesi make it even better.

If you like cars or racing games, then Assetto Corsa is something you should really try. It's one of those games to which you'll keep coming back, for something's always new to try!

184083923.review:
[h1] [10/10] Still the King of Racing Sims, Thanks to Mods [/h1]

[h2] Why Assetto Corsa Still Shines [/h2] 
Assetto Corsa might be nearly a decade old, but it hasn’t lost an ounce of its charm. With its incredible driving physics and attention to detail, the game still holds up as one of the most immersive racing simulators ever made. What truly makes it special, though, is the vibrant modding community that keeps bringing fresh life into the game.

[h2] The Power of Mods [/h2] 
The sheer variety of mods available is mind-blowing. Whether you want to test a hypercar on a laser-accurate Nürburgring, explore a scenic canyon road, or throw a vintage racer around a classic circuit, there’s something for everyone. And it’s not just about cars and tracks—visual mods like reshades, photorealistic textures, and weather upgrades make the game look absolutely stunning, rivaling even modern racing games.

[h2] A Dream on a Racing Rig [/h2] 
Playing Assetto Corsa with a proper racing rig takes the experience to another level. The force feedback lets you feel every bump, turn, and loss of grip, creating an incredibly realistic driving experience. Whether you’re chasing lap times or simply enjoying a relaxing cruise, the level of immersion is unbeatable.

[h2] It Never Gets Old [/h2]
One of the best things about Assetto Corsa is that it’s impossible to get bored. The combination of endless modding possibilities and a dynamic online racing scene means there’s always something new to explore. You can go from competitive league races one day to a chill sunset cruise with friends the next.

[h2] Excitement for Corsa Evo [/h2]
And now, the excitement is building for Corsa Evo, the next chapter in the series, launching next month! If the previews are anything to go by, it’s going to elevate everything we love about Assetto Corsa—next-level physics, stunning visuals, and even more robust modding tools. It feels like the perfect evolution of an already incredible game, and I can’t wait to dive in.

[h2] Looking forward! [/h2] 
Assetto Corsa is a testament to what happens when a well-designed game meets a passionate community. It’s a title that’s stood the test of time and keeps getting better, year after year. With Corsa Evo on the horizon, there’s no better time to jump in and see what makes this series so special.

On its own, Assetto Corsa is a weak offering. Like, there is literally nothing notable or good about it. 

However, Assetto Corsa is THE platform of modding. People are still sinking tons of hours on this game purely because of modding. Mods ranges from paid excellent, free excellent, meh, free shit, paid shit, and memes. It's up to you to comb through millions of mods to craft that perfect experience for you. Many grass root simracing leagues are also on Assetto Corsa because of the low cost of entry. 

If you are patient enough to deal with modding, this is a no-brainer buy.

If you own a racing wheel of any kind, you should own this game.

QOL features and ease of getting into the real fun (servers with traffic, custom maps, etc) can be a lot of work and a steep learning curve for some new at this sort of stuff, but there's plenty of resources online if you're willing to set everything up right. The results, can be quite rewarding after all is said and done.

Highly recommend as a really neat sim-racing game for those with a wheel especially, and for anyone who is looking to get into sim-racing in general. It's a lot of fun once you have it all set up to you preference, and great to play with friends too if you are playing on custom or hosted servers.

After dedicating over [b]300 hours[/b] to Assetto Corsa, I can confidently say it stands as a premier racing simulator that masterfully balances realism with engaging gameplay. Whether you're a casual driver or a hardcore sim racer, Assetto Corsa offers an experience that caters to all enthusiasts.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Driving Experience and Realism[/h2]  
Assetto Corsa's driving physics are unparalleled, delivering a lifelike experience that captures the nuances of real-world racing. The attention to detail in car handling, tire modeling, and track surfaces is exceptional, making each lap feel authentic and rewarding. The game's commitment to realism is evident, providing a driving experience that is both challenging and satisfying. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Content and Modding Community[/h2]  
The base game features a diverse selection of cars and tracks, all meticulously recreated with laser-scan technology. However, the true depth of Assetto Corsa lies in its robust modding community. With thousands of user-generated mods available, including new vehicles, tracks, and gameplay enhancements, the possibilities are virtually endless. This extensive customization ensures that the game remains fresh and engaging, even after hundreds of hours of play. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

[h2]Graphics and Performance[/h2]  
Assetto Corsa boasts impressive graphics, with detailed car models and realistic track environments. The lighting and weather effects further enhance the visual experience, creating an immersive atmosphere that draws you into the race. Performance is generally stable, and the game runs smoothly on a range of hardware configurations, allowing for a consistent and enjoyable experience.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Multiplayer and Community Engagement[/h2]  
The multiplayer component offers a platform for competitive racing, with a variety of servers catering to different skill levels and preferences. [h2]Final Thoughts[/h2]  
Assetto Corsa sets a high standard in the realm of racing simulations, offering a driving experience that is both authentic and engaging. 183767974.review:
Review from a big car fanatic (who knows what they are talking about)
There are quite a few racing sims, but out of all of them this is my personal favorite, and is probably the best of them all. 

Graphics - 8.5/10 | The shaders in this game can be INCREDIBLE especially with mods, and with customizable options, its just wild how great the shaders can be. However, the track detail is where you notice some downsides. For the track itself, it is really high quality like the shaders, but the trees and some other backround parts could be a lot better.

Physics and Realism - 10/10 | By far, assetto corsa has the most realistic car physics out of all the other sim racing games. (except parts of the crash physics, but no car game has good crash physics because of licensing deals and stuff, but damage that would directly effect how the car drives, like wheel or axle damage still functions as it would irl) They mastered pretty much everything down, and it is very realistic. 

UI - 4/5 | The base game UI is pretty outdated, but it was made quite a bit ago so it does make sense. However, with mods and certain online servers, you can make it look a lot nicer. Plus, if you uses Content Manager (the platform used for adding mods to the game) instead of the regular launcher, it has a completely refreshed look with a bunch of other features.

Sound/audio - 9/10 | The base game's audio quality is actually a little bit outdated, but they dont reuse the same engine sounds like some other games *cough* FORZA *cough* *cough*. Also, when you get mods, they usually have better sound quality. 

Mods - 10/10 | These modders KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOING. by a million percent. They get the detail down so incredibly to each part of the car and how it functions. Seriously, if you are going to get this game, you DEFINETELY need to get mods. Not only that, its incredibly easy to download and add mods. With content manager, you can usually just download the pack online and just drag it into content manager and it will install. The modders get the sound right to, adding the actual sounds of tha car for the most time. Plus, you can unlock awesome online servers, like No Hesi, and get some of your favorite cars to drive. Its incredible.

If you have anything to ask, ill gladly answer it asap in the comment section :D
I hope this helps!

183712502.review:
Assetto Corsa to jeden z najlepszych symulatorów wyścigowych, który przenosi pasję do motoryzacji na zupełnie nowy poziom. Gra pozwala poczuć się jak zawodowy kierowca, oferując niezwykle realistyczną fizykę jazdy i możliwość prowadzenia najróżniejszych maszyn – od klasycznych samochodów sportowych po potężne bolidy. Ale ostrzegam: ta gra nie bierze jeńców, a ja sam, przez swoją obsesję na punkcie idealnego przejazdu, „zabiłem” swoją wirtualną rodzinę... w grze, oczywiście.

Realizm, który pochłania
Assetto Corsa zachwyca dopracowaniem szczegółów. Każdy samochód czuje się inaczej, a tor wymaga pełnego skupienia. Najmniejszy błąd – zbyt późne hamowanie, źle dobrana linia zakrętu – kończy się katastrofą. To nie arcade, gdzie możesz jechać na skróty, tylko symulator, który uczy pokory. I właśnie ten poziom realizmu sprawił, że moja wirtualna rodzina… no cóż, nie dojechała do mety.

Historia „rodzinnej” tragedii w grze
Grając w trybie kampanii, dałem się ponieść ambicji. Chciałem przejechać perfekcyjny wyścig, testując granice prędkości na krętym torze. Wybrałem tryb jazdy z pasażerami, wcielając się w rolę kierowcy rodzinnego vana (tak, modderzy to dodali – dzięki nim mamy więcej niż sportowe fury). Niestety, nadmierna prędkość, zakręt i moja chęć „przecięcia apexu” zakończyły się spektakularną kraksą. W grze rodzina skończyła na poboczu, a ja poczułem się jak bohater filmu akcji, który zawiódł swoich bliskich.

Dlaczego mimo wszystko to kocham?
Pomimo tych dramatycznych chwil (w grze!), Assetto Corsa daje niesamowitą satysfakcję. Kiedy uda ci się przejechać perfekcyjne okrążenie, czujesz się, jakbyś zdobył mistrzostwo świata. Modowalność gry i ogromna społeczność fanów pozwalają dostosować ją do swoich potrzeb – możesz ścigać się na kultowych torach, prowadzić klasyczne auta czy nawet eksplorować stworzone przez graczy szalone mapy.

Podsumowanie
Assetto Corsa to gra, która dostarcza emocji na najwyższym poziomie. Realizm i wciągająca rozgrywka sprawiają, że ciężko się od niej oderwać. Czasem nawet za bardzo, co może prowadzić do wirtualnych „tragedii”. Ale hej – każda porażka to lekcja, a każdy perfekcyjny przejazd to powód do dumy.

Ocena: 9/10
Doskonała symulacja, która wciąga bez reszty… ale może nie wsiadaj do vana z rodziną, nawet w grze. 😉

183671163.review:
Обзор Assetto Corsa: Как не стать гонщиком, но почувствовать себя им

Если вы когда-нибудь мечтали стать гонщиком, но ваши навыки управления автомобилем ограничиваются нажатием кнопок в лифте, то Assetto Corsa — это именно то, что вам нужно. Этот симулятор виртуальной боли и унижения бросит вас в мир профессиональных гонок, где вы будете страдать, потеть и задаваться вопросом, зачем вы вообще купили этот гребаный руль.
Графика: "Реализм" уровня 2014

Сразу бросается в глаза потрясающая графика, будто вы смотрите на гонки через окно в машине 2002 года. Трассы выглядят настолько реалистично, что вы можете почти почувствовать аромат пыли из монитора. Да, на солнце всё блестит, но только до тех пор, пока вы не въедете в стену и не обнаружите, что повреждения машины — это не про Assetto Corsa. Ваша тачка выглядит как новая, но вот вы уже готовы психануть и выкинуть клавиатуру.
Физика: Симуляция ада на колесах

Вы думаете, что умеете водить машину? Ха! Здесь каждая мелочь — от температуры шин до влажности воздуха — влияет на то, как вы будете разносить свою машину по трассе. Чуть-чуть перекрутите руль, и вы уже вращаетесь как юла, а весь мир кричит: "Git gud, noob!". Спасибо, Assetto Corsa, я и так знаю, что я бесполезен.
Интерфейс: Квест "найди настройки"

Наверное, разработчики решили, что простой и понятный интерфейс — это слишком скучно. Хочешь настроить машину? Удачи! Куча слайдеров, графиков и терминов, которые звучат как из учебника по астрофизике. В какой-то момент ты просто бросаешь попытки разобраться и выбираешь "по умолчанию". Почему? Потому что твой IQ не рассчитан на эти настройки.
Мультиплеер: Добро пожаловать в ад

Заходишь в онлайн, думая, что "ну в этот раз-то я всех уделаю", и тут тебя выносят парни с никами типа "xXxSpeedDemonxXx". А самое обидное, что они делают это на старых Фиатов, пока ты сидишь в своей виртуальной Ламборгини и ревёшь. Вывод: онлайн — это место, где твои мечты умирают быстрее, чем твои шины.
Итог

Assetto Corsa — это не игра, а испытание на выносливость и терпение. Если вы хотите почувствовать себя беспомощным, но при этом продолжать возвращаться, как в токсичные отношения, то это ваш выбор. Спасибо, Kunos Simulazioni, вы официально убили мои нервы.

Оценка: 9/10. Потому что, несмотря на весь этот трэш, ты всё равно продолжаешь играть. С болью. С ненавистью. Но играешь.

183617987.review:
長らくこのゲームをプレイしてきました。　このゲームの９割はMODに依存しています。バニラ要素があればそれはゲームエンジンによる車の挙動くらいでしょう。　車両もコースもグラフィックも天候を変化させるのもMODで、ゲームを起動するためにもMODであるランチャーを経由して起動します。ですのでデスクトップ画面にあるAssetto Corsaのアイコンをクリックして起動しません。
私もこのアセットコルサのアイコンから起動したのはいつかも覚えていないくらいです。
そのくらいMODがメインになるゲームです。

MODを利用する前提のこのゲームは手軽にアセットコルサを遊びたい人にとっては不向きです。MODの導入方法を学んでインストールしたとしても不具合が生じたりすることは最初の方だと頻繁に起こります。ゲームをまともにプレイするために時間を要することは確実です。

しかしながらそれでもアセットコルサには魅力があるゲームです。ゲームのリアルな挙動をもとに自分が乗りたい車で走らせたい道で好きなように走らせることができるからです。

すべてが自由であるが故に逆に目的やゴールのようなゲーム性は皆無です。
自分でアセットコルサの遊び方を見つけなければすぐに飽きてしまう、そんなゲームです。

ですので参考までに私や私の知人の遊び方を載せておきます。
好きな車で好きなコースを走る。ドリフト車両を導入してドリフト練習（実車の練習にもなります）最高にリアルなグラフィックを突き詰める（本当にリアルになります）オンラインレースに参加する。オンライン部屋でみんなでドリフトする。友人とオンライン部屋で遊ぶ。リプレイカメラを作成したり導入したりして車両をかっこよく映す。MODを作成して世に出す。車の写真や動画を撮影してSNSに載せる。MODを導入してドライブする。一人称視点の揺れをリアルにする。MODで車両の馬力等を変えて遊ぶ。MOD車両をとにかく入れる。UIを他ゲームに寄せて遊ぶ（頭文字DやGT7風に）AIやオンラインでと峠、首都高バトル。実車タイムをアセットコルサで超える。車載カメラ風のリプレイカメラを作る。エンジンサウンドを変える。コースのスキンを変える（○○年のF1風等）
MODを導入してAIとドリフト追走練習、競技ドリフトに参加する。日本の公道を走る。F1やSuperGTのMODを入れて好きなスキンでコースでレースする。VRでプレイする。リアルなハンコンやペダルを購入して遊ぶ。MODを入れてコントローラーで手軽に遊ぶ。
（コントローラーではプレイできない旨のレビューが多いですが、ドリフトでもレースでもMODを入れればむしろコントローラーの方が強いというくらいに実用的なMODも存在しています）
ＸでのSNSコミュニティは今でも盛んに行われているのでそこに参加するのもいいかもしれません。いい人も悪い人もいますが、民度は良い方だと思います。

ここからやってみたい遊び方はありましたか。これでもほんの一例にしかすぎません。
このゲームはグランツーリスモやフォルツァの様に目的やゴールが設定されておらず初めて起動したときから何もない野原にポツンと野放しにされてしまいます。
ですから自ら遊び方を見つけて、ゲーム性は自分で作り上げていく姿勢が長く楽しく遊ぶために最も大切なことです。

現在ではYouTube等で日本語でやさしく０からMODの導入を案内している動画も多くあります。時には英語の動画の視聴も必要になりますが、画面の通りに進められれば問題ありません。

本当に車好きな人にとってはユートピアのようなゲームです。新作のAssetto CorsaEVOも発表されましたが、発売されてもしばらくはMOD環境は整わないかと予想されますので新作に興味がある方もお試しとしてこのゲームを遊ぶのもおすすめします。
